verbs.description: denicotinize (third-person singular simple present denicotinizes, present participle denicotinizing, simple past and past participle denicotinized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) to remove some or all of the nicotine from tobacco.
examples: My invention relates to a chemical preparation, compound, or mixture to be used in pipes, pipe-stems, and cigar-holders, in any convenient mode or form, to denicotinize and deodorize tobacco-smoke,
